00008 subroutine stamp(istream,ibegin)
00009   character :: fdate*24
00010   character :: cdate*8, ctime*10, czone*5
00011   integer :: vals(4)
00012   integer :: ibegin
00013 
00014      !      call DATE_AND_TIME(cdate,ctime,czone,vals)
00015      call DATE_AND_TIME(cdate,ctime,czone)
00016 
00017      if (ibegin.eq.1) then
00018 
00019         write(istream,'(//a20,a12/a20,a12/a20,a12//)') 'PEPC run on ' & 
00020              ,cdate(7:8)//'/'//cdate(5:6)//'/'//cdate(1:4) &
00021              ,'Time: ',ctime(1:2)//':'//ctime(3:4)//':'//ctime(5:6),' GMT+',czone
00022 
00023      else 
00024         write(istream,'(a,a9)') 'Finished run at time: ',ctime(1:2)//':'//ctime(3:4)//':'//ctime(5:6)
00025      endif
00026 end subroutine stamp
